wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor

Class FilterEditor.EditorFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.RowFilter
      • wissim.controller.filters.Filter
        • wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor.FilterEditor.EditorFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFilter
    Enclosing class:
    FilterEditor

    final class FilterEditor.EditorFilter
extends Filter
    Wrapper of the filter associated to the EditorComponent, ensuring some added functionality (like auto-adding to the history list when the filter changes).

      • attemptEditorFilterUpdate

        public boolean attemptEditorFilterUpdate(javax.swing.RowFilter filter)
        Attempts an update on a editor filter. It is only performed if the filter let pass rows (does not filter all out)
